definition: to post sensitive personal information about a person publicly without their consent, as a way to terrorize or punish someone, sensitive, personal information about someone, including address, government identifications, credit cards, family situations, sexual history, and other private information
details:
verb
- to post sensitive personal information about a person publicly without their consent, as a way to terrorize or punish someone
= example: to post sensitive personal information about a person publicly without their consent, as a way to terrorize or punish someone
noun
- sensitive, personal information about someone, including address, government identifications, credit cards, family situations, sexual history, and other private information
= example: sensitive, personal information about someone, including address, government identifications, credit cards, family situations, sexual history, and other private information
